mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from Jennie Howard to Dr. Thomas Henry Howard Dated Jan. 18, 1869
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A letter from Jennie Howard, dated Jan. 18, 1869, in which she writes to her brother in law Dr. Howard with excitement that he will come to visit so soon. She details general news about crop and livestock prices. She writes details concerning Dr. Howard's arrival in Georgia and arrangements that might be made. Jennie expresses that she is anxious to see him, and to hear news and see pictures of the rest of the family.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Courtship
